Reviews.Title: Canon EOS M 18.0 MP Compact Systems Mirrorless Camera with EF-M18-55mm IS...
Reviews.Author: pl "PL"
Reviews.Content: Nice little camera body, small and light weight, less bulky than the SLR.  The lens is more compact too.  I have another lens from my Canon Digital Rebel that fits with a mount adapter, but is bulkier.  The addition of this lens makes the case too small to carry everything.

ProductInfo.Features:
This kit includes 12 items; Camera, Lens & Flash includes all manufacturer's supplied accessories, All items are backed with Hot Deals Electronics 1 year 100% Satisfaction Guarantee
Canon EOS M 18.0 MP Compact Systems Mirrorless Camera with 3.0-Inch LCD (Body) - Canon EF-M18-55mm IS STM Zoom Lens - Speedlite 90EX Flash (import, backed by Hot Deals Electronics 1 year guarantee)
16 Gigabyte SDHC Secure Digital Memory Card - SD USB Memory Card Reader - 12 Slot Foldable Memory Card Case
Additional LP-E12 Rechargeable Lithium ion Replacement Battery Pack - Well Padded Digital Camera Carrying Case with Pockets, & Neck Strap
UV (Ultraviolet) Protection Filter - 5pc. Deluxe Lens Care & Cleaning Kit - Package of LCD Screen Protectors - Quality Fiber Cleaning Cloth
ProductInfo.Name: Canon EOS M 18.0 MP Compact Systems Mirrorless Camera with EF-M18-55mm IS STM Lens and Speedlite 90EX Flash (Import) + 9pc Bundle 16GB Accessory Kit
